jobDescription: Computer Vision Scientist  If you are a Computer Vision Software Engineer with Imaging experience, please read on!  Computer Vision Software Engineer  Location: Bellevue, WA  2-4 month contract FTE potentially  Be on the forefront of a new, ground-breaking technology. Spearheaded by a team of highly experienced business leaders and specialized engineers, we offer a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to build one of the most highly anticipated technologies of our time. Countless devices across the globe will one day use our safe and smart solutions. You will feel great about creating new and clean technology that helps people stay always on and always connected.What You Will Be Doing
